name: "Cityscape #2"
description: This is a huge original abstract painting. The sides are painted and it is ready to hang. The painting has a very thick visible texture and is a great modern piece of art for decorating a living space. This piece is called "Cityscape #2", and is part of a series depicting the energy and life of modern cityscapes. This piece is particularly abstract with a thick texture and vibrant shades of red. This style creates a quick and energetic feel between the thick texture and the vibrant hues. The painting will add a wonderful energy to any room, with deep colors and a bright, warming feel.
